lead_paragraph: Barcelona could be without captain Andres Iniesta for the rest of the year after the midfielder sustained a knee injury in an eventful 3-2 La Liga win for the leaders at Valencia on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Injured Iniesta Faces Long Spell Out for Barca
headline.main: Injured Iniesta Faces Long Spell Out for Barca

snippet: Barcelona could be without captain Andres Iniesta for the rest of the year after the midfielder sustained a knee injury in an eventful 3-2 La Liga win for the leaders at Valencia on Saturday....
